/Lotus/Language/Menu/ModDescTip: Descrive l'effetto di questo Mod. La Fusione ne aumenta la potenza.
/Lotus/Language/Menu/ModCostTip: Capacità richiesta per installare questo Mod in un elemento. La capacità dei Mod aumenta ad ogni livello dell'oggetto.
/Lotus/Language/Menu/ModRankTip: Livello Fusione attuale di questa Mod. Fondi altre Mod con questa per aumentarlo.
/Lotus/Language/Menu/ModTypeTip: Tipo di oggetto associato a questa Mod.
/Lotus/Language/Menu/ModStatsTip: Rarità Mod. Il livello della Fusione sarà mostrato dopo la fusione.
/Lotus/Language/Menu/ModPolarityTip: Polarità Mod. Inserire la mod nello slot corretto ne riduce il costo in capacità. Abbinarne la Polarità migliora i risultati della Fusione.
/Lotus/Language/Menu/FuseButtonTip: Usa FUSIONE per assorbire Mods in questo per aumentarne la potenza.
/Lotus/Language/Menu/ConfirmUpgradeCance: Configurazione dei mod cambiata.L'uscita non salva i cambiamenti.
/Lotus/Language/Menu/PostPurchaseSyncFai: L'oggetto è stato acquistato correttamente, ma si è verificato un errore caricando il tuo inventario. Sarai ora sconnesso.
/Lotus/Language/Menu/ErrorTooLargeDrainO: Fusione non possibile: Il mod installato supererebbe la capacità disponibile.
/Lotus/Language/Menu/ErrorCantSellUnique: |MOD| non verrà venduto. L'unica copia in tuo possesso di una abilità non può essere venduta.
/Lotus/Language/Menu/ConfirmSellingInsta: |MOD| è attualmente installato. Sei sicuro di volerlo vendere?
/Lotus/Language/Menu/ConfirmFusingInstal: |MOD| è attualmente installato. Se lo fondi, andrà perso.
/Lotus/Language/Menu/CouponDesc: % di sconto sul tuo prossimo acquisto di Platinum.
/Lotus/Language/Menu/GM_ThanksA: I Tenno hanno ottenuto grande forza grazie a te, Gran Maestro |PLAYER_NAME|.
/Lotus/Language/Menu/GM_ThanksB: Il Lotus è lieto di trovarsi in presenza di un Gran Maestro. Grazie |PLAYER_NAME|.
/Lotus/Language/Menu/GM_ThanksC: Siamo in debito con te Gran Maestro |PLAYER_NAME|. Grazie.
/Lotus/Language/Menu/GM_ThanksD: Con il tuo supporto Gran Maestro |PLAYER_NAME|, i Tenno risorgeranno.
/Lotus/Language/Menu/GM_ThanksE: Ora i Tenno sono più forti grazie al tuo aiuto Gran Maestro |PLAYER_NAME|.
/Lotus/Language/Menu/GM_ThanksNotInYet: I Tenno hanno ottenuto grande forza grazie a te, Gran Maestro |PLAYER_NAME|. Nota: la tua locazione verrà aggiunta presto!
/Lotus/Language/Menu/BreakAdvice: Stai giocando da più di un'ora. Per favore ricordati di fare una pausa ogni tanto.
/Lotus/Language/Menu/ModSellingTip: TIP: Hold <PRE_RUN> while clicking on cards to select multiple cards to sell at once.
/Lotus/Language/Menu/ModSellingTip_PS4: TIP: Hold <MENU_LTRIGGER1> when pressing <MENU_SELECT> to select multiple cards to sell at once.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ResurrectionSt: Lotus: Your ally has died. Head to a Resurrection Station to bring them back!
Lotus: You've failed revive an ally, find a Resurrection Station and bring them back!
Lotus: Your teammate has died. Seek a Resurrection Station now to let them return.
Lotus: A Tenno has fallen. Find a Resurrection Station on this Ship!
Lotus: A fellow Tenno has died. Bring them back to battle at a Resurrection Station!
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BlastDoorProbl: Lotus: I've detected a Blast Door guarding the target. Install a bypass on the controls.
Lotus: There's a Blast Door in the way. Patch me in on the Control Panel and I'll take care of it.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/SystemBypassA: Lotus: Protect the relay. Running system bypass.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/SystemBypassB: Lotus: Okay, I'm in. Hold this position while I bypass the system controls.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BypassComplete: Lotus: Bypass complete. You may proceed.
Lotus: The bypass is done. Go!
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/CorpusBipedA: Lotus: Corpus Walkers are heading to your location.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/CorpusBipedD: Lotus: Looks like heavy activity ahead.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/CorpusBipedE: Lotus: Heavy robotics signature detected. Lock and load.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/CorpusJackalA: Lotus: Here comes trouble. A Corpus Jackal is in your sector.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/CorpusJackalB: Lotus: Brace yourselves. A Jackal has been detected in your area.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/CorpusQuadrape: Lotus: Here comes trouble. A Corpus Quadraped is in your sector.
Lotus: Brace yourselves. A Corpus Quadraped has been detected in your area.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DronesDetected: Lotus: Warning. I have detected Drone robotics.
Lotus: They're deplying Drone robotics. Be careful.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/GrineerMarines: Lotus: Heads up. A Grineer assault team is headed your way.
Lotus: I'm detecting a large security force heading your way. It's the Grineer.
Lotus: Watch yourself, foot soldiers are on the way.
Lotus: There are Grineer marines all over.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/HeavyGrineerB: Lotus: Something's wrong, there's a Heavy Unit approaching.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/InfestedIncomi: Lotus: Multiple bio-signatures detected, we've got Infested incoming.
Lotus: Heavy infestation ahead. Get ready.
Lotus: Multiple targets ahead. Leave no one standing.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusSentientA: Lotus: I am picking up strange energy fluctuations in the area, remain vigilant.
Lotus: This is unexpected, our enemy [does] not operate on these fre[quencies].
Lotus: I'm unable to [maintain comunications.] Tenno, change of [orders. You must get out of there].
Lotus: Tenno, [abort mission] You are [in] DANGER.  Something else [is there]. Something [massively] powerful.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/EnemiesUnaware: Lotus: Keep moving. None of the ship's scanners have detected you.
Lotus: You're still in the clear. No detection from the ship's sensors.
Lotus: Keep going. No body knows you're on this ship.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/EnemiesAwareA: Lotus: Damn... You're on the sensors now. You've been detected.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/EnemiesAwareB: Lotus: They spotted you. Get ready for a fight.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/EnemiesAwareC: Lotus: You've been seen. Ready your weapon.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ShipIcedUpA: Lotus: This ship cryogenics core has malfunctioned. Expect colder-than-normal temperatures.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ShipIcedUpB: Lotus: The temperature readings are freezing. The ice in here will damage your shields.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ShipIcedUpC: Lotus: I'm detecting ice... lots of it. Be cautious, your shields will take a hit from the cold.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ShipOnFireA: Lotus: It looks like this ship has taken some hits. Stay away from fire damage.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ShipOnFireB: Lotus: This vessel is self-destructing! Stay away from heat.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ShipOnFireC: Lotus: Ammunition storage has become volatile. Rounds are combusting everywhere. Stay away from the fire.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ShipOnLockdown: Lotus: Ship is entering lock down. We'll need to override the system.
Lotus: Doors are locked. Time to break in.
Lotus: We've been locked out. Let's overhaul the security.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LockdownBypass: Lotus: Breach complete. We're free to proceed.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossArnEtinaTr: Lotus: Corpus Artifact Analyst, Arn Etina is responsible for reverse engineering Orokin weapons. His breakthroughs are mass produced and sold to the Grineer. Eliminate him to give the Tenno an edge in battle.
Lotus: Etina has made quantum leaps in his work as of late. If left to his own devices, there is no telling what secrets may be unlocked. Eliminating him is imperative.
Lotus: The Corpus have a large security force protecting Etina and his research. Getting to him will not be easy.
Lotus: You are nearing Etina's location. It is likely he will be heavily armed.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossArnEtinaVa: Lotus: If left to his own devices, there is no telling what secrets Etina may unlock. Eliminating him is our only option.
Lotus: The Corpus have a large security force protecting Etina and his research. Stay the course.
Lotus: You are nearing Etina's location. It is likely he will be heavily armed with his own discoveries.
Lotus: Eliminating Etina will temporarily impede weapons research. This will buy our spy cells much needed time.
Lotus: Etina is notoriously protective of his research. Eliminating will silence his work forever.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossBipedAmbul: Lotus: The newest entry into the Corpus AI security arsenal is a deadly biped dubbed Ambulas. We have tracked the prototype to this ship. Locate and eliminate it.
Lotus: Obliterate the prototype. We need to be certain it does not make it to the manufacturing stage.
Lotus: Destroying Ambulas will be a blow to Corpus robotics research. Stay the course.
Lotus: Ambulas possess a devastating kick for those who get too close. Long range attacks are advisable.
Lotus: Corpus robotics technology is reaching grave proportions. Destroying this archetype is imperative.
Lotus: Ambulas likes to play with fire. Try not to get burned.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossHyenaTrans: Lotus: Recent innovations in Corpus robotics have lead to a surge in production. The newest breed consists of small, unrelenting animal-like proxies that stalk their prey in packs. Codenamed "Hyena", these robots must be destroyed.
Lotus: We have tracked the location of one of these packs to this vessel. Let the hunt ensue.
Lotus: Several cells have been lost as a result of underestimation. Do not let their size fool you. They are small but incredibly lethal.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossJackalTran: Lotus: In an attempt to exert power and authority, the Corpus recently introduced their most lethal security proxy yet. Determine its location aboard this vessel and destroy it.
Lotus: Nicknamed "The Jackal," this is the same deadly quad-robot which has become extremely problematic for our cells in the field.
Lotus: Do not dismiss the The Jackal as just another Corpus proxy. This will be unlike any enemy you have faced yet.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossNefAnyoTra: Lotus: Sergeant Nef Anyo oversees operations of the Solar Rails in this district. Intelligence reports indicate that Anyo has been using the rails to acquire recovered cryo-pods containing dormant Warframes. Kill him and save your fellow Tenno.
Lotus: Anyo is stockpiling the pods and selling them to the highest bidders. His clientele includes rogue scientists and splinter groups with nefarious intentions.
Lotus: Eliminate Anyo. When the job is finished we will send in a clean-up team to recover the pods.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossNefAnyoVar: Lotus: Anyo's self-interests are a threat to our ongoing operations. He must be removed immediately.
Lotus: Anyo's venture has afforded him the best in Corpus security robotics. Eliminate anything that moves.
Lotus: Anyo has too much at stake. He will fight to the death.
Lotus: We cannot allow the Warframes to fall into the wrong hands. Taking Anyo out is imperative.
Lotus: Security has tightened in this section. You are nearing Anyo's position.
Lotus: Anyo is aware of your presence. Get the jump on him.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossCouncillor: Lotus: Director of the Sol Council, Vay Hek is entrusted with settling diplomatic disputes between various races of the Solar System. He abused this power with the premeditated murder of several political opponents. His appointment is dangerous to our continued efforts.
Lotus: Hek travels with a formidable security force. Getting close to him will prove difficult.
Lotus: Intel suggests Hek is planning to add to his list of departed adversaries, including several of our own. Take him out.
Lotus: Security is getting heavier. Hek must be close.
Lotus: Killing Hek will bring much needed stability to this sector.
Lotus: Hek has made many enemies. Eliminating him could gain us favor with the council.
Lotus: You have Hek insight. Stay alert, and stay alive!
Lotus: Hek is notoriously unpredictable. Be prepared for anything.
Lotus: If Hek is allowed to live there could be drastic repercussions for the entire system. Take him down. There is no other option.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossLieutenant: Lotus: Lieutenant Lech Kril has been implicated in a Grineer plot to annihilate one of our remote colonies in this sector. The plan is to alter the course of a rogue asteroid which will put the colony directly in the planetoid's path. Locate and eliminate Kril.
Lotus: Kril is a seasoned war hero with many battles under his belt. His victories are decided by his trusty hammer. One which he wields with brutal consequences.
Lotus: Kril is highly unpredictable. We suspect he may have other tricks up his sleeve. To survive this battle, you must strike hard and fast.
Lotus: You are nearing Kril's location. Proceed with caution.
Lotus: Kril is aware of your presence. Strike first!
Lotus: Eliminating Kril is the only chance for our exposed colony.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossTylRegorTr: Lotus: Grineer researcher Tyl Regor has made significant strides in gene repair. This could reverse centuries of deterioration suffered by his people as a result of cloning. Eliminate Regor and put a stop to his work.
Lotus: The Corpus have locked the Grineer into financial dependence for grafts and antidotes to slow physical deterioration. We need to ensure that the Corpus continue to control this.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossTylRegorVa: Lotus: Regor is aware of your presence. Bring him down quickly.
Lotus: Regor will fight to the death to see this project through. We cannot let that happen. Silence his work.
Lotus: We are not certain how far along Regor's work has come. Eliminating him will afford us time to dig deeper.
Lotus: Expect Regor to be armed with the best in Grineer weapons and defense capabilities.
Lotus: Regor's grunts are in full force. He must be close.
Lotus: Regor's obsession with immortality is a serious concern. Brilliant minds can achieve brilliant things. He must be terminated.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossGeneralSar: Lotus: General Sargas Ruk has become a problem for our artifact recovery efforts. Several of our dig sites in this sector have been attacked and annexed by Ruk and his fleet. Take Ruk out.
Lotus: Ruk sees flesh as a flaw. As a result, he has built a profitable artifact smuggling outfit to finance his search for the best in Grineer body modifications and augmentations.
Lotus: Ruk is nearby. Be warned that he is a formidable adversary, with an almost inhuman hatred for all that is not Grineer.
Lotus: Ruk is the Grineer's preeminent artifact hunter. Taking him out will cripple their artifact recovery efforts.
Lotus: Ruk will be adorning only the most impressive in Grineer body modifications. You will need to stay one step ahead of him.
Lotus: Eliminating Ruk will allow us to regain control of this system.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossCaptainVor: Lotus: Captain Vor has lived under suspicion of possessing Orokin technology that grants him powerful abilities. We cannot allow this. Get to his location and eliminate him.
Lotus: Further intel suggests that Vor acquired his abilities while working recovery missions for the fleet as a freighter hand.
Lotus: You are nearing Vor's position. Be prepared for a violent battle.
Lotus: This ship is crawling with grunts. Getting to Vor will prove difficult.
Lotus: Vor's reputation precedes him. Taking him down will be a favor to the entire system.
Lotus: Vor is feared across the system. Do not underestimate him.
Lotus: We believe Vor has the ability to teleport. You will need to watch your back.
Lotus: Vor has a tendency to play with his prey. Do not let yourself become distracted by this tactic.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossKelaDeThay: Lotus: Kela de Thaym holds a position of influence in the Grineer Court. Eliminating Kela should create a power vacuum  inside the Grineer leadership and weaken Grineer influence in this system.
Lotus: Kela is a product of the Sisters. She is built for combat. Much of her body has been replaced with combat augmentations. Approach her with caution.
Lotus: I'm detecting a bio-mechanical signature nearby. Be ready for anything.
Lotus: Intel suggests Kela is armed with explosive weaponry, her personal modification of the Bombard design. Take any necessary precautions to ensure this mission's success.
Lotus: Kela keeps an entourage of highly-trained Grineer marines with her. We suspect that they are as much for her entertainment as they are for protection.

Lotus: All Grineer females undergo mandatory military training. Kela in particular revels in combat. She extended her term for more than a decade before returning to the Court. Do not underestimate her.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossGolemTranm: Lotus: Reports of Infestation attacks on our vessels in this sector have increased exponentially. We believe this millennia old Orokin-turned-Infested ship to be responsible.
Lotus: Deep within lurks a creature created by the Orokin to battle the Sentients during the Old War. Make your way to its location and dispatch this monster.
Lotus: Be wary. The creature has grown unfathomably strong through centuries of absorbing matter and self-replication.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossPhoridTran: Lotus: One of our spy cells has been lost investigating this abandoned Grineer asteroid base. We need you to locate and eliminate whatever is responsible.
Lotus: This place is crawling with Infested. Unfortunately, something far more ominous awaits. Make your way deeper into the base.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/BossPhoridVari: Lotus: Your target is an aberration of twisted flesh. Put the thing out of its misery.
Lotus: Avoid the creature's spine-strike. These razor-sharp quills will rip your Warframe to shreds.
Lotus: The creature is incredibly agile for a deformed quadruped. Keep moving to avoid being crushed.
Lotus: Listen for its screams. This will mean you are getting close.
Lotus: Elude its bone-chilling shrieks if you wish to stay alive.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusBossCorpu: Lotus: The destruction of the Ambulas biped prototype has halted Corpus production plans for this latest model. We hope it is the only of its kind out there.
Lotus: The death of Arn Etina means the Corpus mineral pipeline has been severed. Robotics production will be disrupted for weeks.
Lotus: Robotics with a pack mentality. The Corpus are beginning to raise all defenses. The hyena model is the deadliest yet.
Lotus: Seeing the Jackal in action is grim. It's clear the Corpus are capable of producing robotics beyond what we imagined.
Lotus: The death of Sergeant Ned Anyo should weaken the Corpus Research and Development operations for quite sometime.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusBossGrine: Lotus: The defeat of Grineer Captain Vor opens up other regions for the Tenno.
Lotus: The death of Counselor Vay Hek will bring all Grineer deployments to a halt.
Lotus: Eliminating a Grineer General will render the Saturn region helplessly unorganized.

Lotus: The death of revered War Hero, Lech Kril will undoubtedly send shockwaves throughout Grineer society. The silencing of his hammer will bring security to this system, but we have potentially created a martyr in Kril.

Lotus: Tyl Regor was no ordinary Grineer. He was the leader in cloning reproduction, known as C.R. The self-proclaimed Father of Future Grineer, his death will weaken the future production of soldiers.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusBossInfes: Lotus: That Golem was the most complex species of infested we've encountered. Their ability to overtake multiple species is growing.
Lotus: Infested encounters are beginning to reach nightmare-like proportions. This latest abomination proves that there is no limit to the imagination when dealing with these monsters.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/TutorialDialog: Lotus: The Lotus has sent me to save your life. I am your guide. Follow my instructions and you just might survive this.
Lotus: Your people are called Tenno. These are the Grineer. Sworn destroyers of the Tenno. Strike this one down with your blade before he can attack.
Lotus: Excellent. Your mind may have lost the old ways but your body remembers. I will teach you how to survive. Take his weapon.
Lotus: Weapons are keyed to their owners, but you may exploit it for a short time.
Lotus: You have an affinity with the tools of war. Weapons will become more powerful in your hands.
Lotus: When this ship docks your death is certain. I have a stealth ship hidden nearby. I will guide you to the extraction point.
Lotus: These enemy ships are often configured in different ways. I will generate mapping data to help locate your objective.
Lotus: You are progressing better than expected. We could sabotage this ship before your extraction. Your choice.
Lotus: The Lotus will be pleased. You will be rewarded.
Lotus: Excellent. You have proven your worth. The Lotus welcomes you as an agent of the resistance. We will destroy the Grineer and secure a peaceful future of the Tenno people.

Lotus: This is your ship, your home. We operate in cells to protect our numbers, gathering in squads to strike when the time is right. Through the Lotus, we coordinate our attacks and build our strength.
Lotus: Standby, I will update the global network... these show you the events occurring in the outer systems as well as the coordinated goals from the Lotus.

Lotus: Sol. Our solar system. The ancient Solar Rails acts as a high speed network between the enemy ship deployments here. The network starts closed - you must begin here, at the core to open up the codes to other locations.

Lotus: Grineer. Our enemies. Led by their aging monarch, they have launched a campaign to eradicate the Tenno. Their soldiers are made of the genetic garbage left on earth. There is no peace to be made, no bargaining.

Lotus: The Corpus. The reclusive merchant guild. Their robotics scavenge the systems for the Artifacts of the past wars. Out here in the systems, they would love nothing more than to capture a Tenno and his Warframe for dissection in their orbital labs.
Lotus: Infestation. Madness and rage afflict all those who come in contact with them. The Tenno are immune to the technological parasite but if they spread they could overwhelm the outer systems.

Lotus: This is your arsenal, we have procured some starting equipment for you. Here you will choose your mission loadout. Overtime you will learn to specialize and upgrade your equipment to better face the many forms your enemies take.
Lotus: This is the Corpus Market. The trade guild that controls commerce. We buy their wares through various sources to conceal your identity.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial01a: Lotus: I am the Lotus. I will guide you but we must hurry, Vor is coming for you. I see that the cryo-sleep has taken your memory. It does not matter. You are Tenno, I will prepare you.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial02: Lotus: I see that the cryo-sleep has taken your memory. It does not matter. You are Tenno, I will prepare you.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial04: Lotus: A Warframe shows your vital statitics. This shows your health.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial06: Lotus: Your health does not recharge. Touch this healing sphere before we continue.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial07: Lotus: Now, I have engaged your shields. Shields absorb damage before health is affected.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial08: Lotus: Notice how the shields will recharge.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial09: Lotus: I will show you the Tenno fighting system. It has three forms. First is your pistol.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial11: Lotus: This display shows the clip size and total ammo you have.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial12: Lotus: Find ammo on dead enemies and in the environment.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial13: Lotus: Take the ammo and reload your weapon.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial14: Lotus: Excellent, the second form is your long gun. Switch weapons now.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial16: Lotus: Well done. Do you see the indicator below your weapon and Warframe? This is affinity.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial17: Lotus: You increase affinity in combat, and during missions to come. Increase your affinity to unlock the power of your arsenal.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial18: Lotus: Your third and final form is the blade. You do not equip your blade. It is always at the ready.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial19: Lotus: Destroy this target with your blade.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial20: Lotus: A Tenno must use these forms in combination to destroy their enemies.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial21: Lotus: Attack these targets using blade and gun.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial22: Lotus: Impressive. As you level, you receive points to customize your weapons and unlock Warframe powers. I will unlock a power now to demonstrate its use.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial23: Lotus: Power consumes energy. Absorb this energy sphere.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial24: Lotus: Now, unleash your power on this target.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial25: Lotus: We have come to the last part.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial26a: Lotus: We can't afford to waste any more time. You must get to extraction before Vor finds you. Hurry Tenno.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial27: Lotus: I've engaged your map system. Locate your objective.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial28: Lotus: Prove you are worthy to join us. Destroy the targets before time runs out.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial29: Lotus: Excellent, you have attained the rank of Initiate.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial30: Lotus: You have failed my test. Return here tomorrow, if you wish to try again.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial31: Lotus: I await your return when you have learned more. Farewell.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/Tutorial01-03C: Lotus: I am the Lotus, friend and guide. I see that the cryo-sleep has taken your memory. It does not matter. You are Tenno, I will prepare you.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojo1Intr: Lotus: Tenno, you are but one against the hoard. Your survival depends on speed. Go.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojo1Wave: Lotus: You show promise. Alas, this is just the beginning.
Lotus: Our enemies are innumerable. There is no time for rest.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojo1Succ: Lotus: You have passed this test. Tenno, you give me hope that honor and balance may one day be returned to our system.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojo2Intr: Lotus: A Tenno must be a master of all their weapons. Prove yourself with you primary weapon.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojo2Wave: Lotus: I believe you can handle more.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojo3Intr: Lotus: Prove your ability with a sidearm. Eliminate all targets.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojo4Intr: Lotus: Show me that you know of the old ways. Eliminate all targets using your melee weapon.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojo5Intr: Lotus: You have proven your skills with weapons, Tenno but what of your endurance? Can you survive this onslaught?
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojo6Intr: Lotus: Tenno are more than just fighters. Prove your intellect by hacking these terminals.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojo7Intr: Lotus: Time to test your marksmanship. Track and shoot all targets.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojo8Intr: Lotus: Your Warframe is a weapon. Prove you have mastered it's power.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojo9Intr: Lotus: Now we will test your agility. Shoot the targets to create your path.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDojoGener: Lotus: Most disappointing, Tenno. Only return when you are ready for this challenge.
Lotus: It appears you need more practice, Tenno. This challenge awaits you when you are ready.
Lotus: A formidable performance. This test is now complete
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankInitiateA: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Initiate.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankSilverInit: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Silver Initiate.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankGoldInitia: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Gold Initiate.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankNoviceA: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Novice.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankSilverNovi: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Silver Novice.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankGoldNovice: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Gold Novice.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankDiscipleA: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Disciple.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankSilverDisc: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Silver Disciple.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankGoldDiscip: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Gold Disciple.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankSeekerA: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Seeker.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankSilverSeek: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Silver Seeker.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankGoldSeeker: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Gold Seeker.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankHunterA: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Hunter.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankSilverHunt: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Silver Hunter.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankGoldHunter: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Gold Hunter.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankEagleA: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Eagle.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankSilverEagl: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Silver Eagle.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankGoldEagleA: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Gold Eagle.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankTigerA: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Tiger.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankSilverTige: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Silver Tiger.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankGoldTigerA: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Gold Tiger.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankDragonA: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Dragon.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankSilverDrag: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Silver Dragon.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankGoldDragon: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Gold Dragon.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankSageA: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Sage.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankSilverSage: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Silver Sage.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankGoldSageA: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Gold Sage.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankMasterA: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Master.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankMiddleMast: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Middle Master.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/RankGrandMaste: Lotus: You have attained the rank of Grand Master.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusArtifacts: Lotus: These cards represent the artifacts of the Orokin War. Each provides unique boosts to you and your teammates during missions.
Lotus: Each player can choose an artifact from their collection, before the mission begins.
Lotus: These artifacts give a small Tenno squad an edge against their vast enemies.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusFoundryA: Lotus: This is the Foundry. Here you will build powerful new items to expand your arsenal.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusFoundryB: Lotus: To build an item requires a blueprint and its components. While there are blueprints in the market, most are hidden throughout the system.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusFoundryC: Lotus: Search ships and defeat enemies to obtain components. The components found are influenced by the region of space you are in.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusFoundryD: Lotus: The Foundry is key to owning the most powerful weapons and artifacts that exist.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusMatchmaki: Lotus: You control how I connect you with other Tenno agents. You may freely join other agents, restrict it to your contacts or go it alone.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusStarchart: Lotus: Welcome Tenno. This is the Origin System, and you are its ward.
Lotus: Our enemies control the ancient Solar Rail Network and with it, travel throughout the regions. Complete missions to regain control of the network.
Lotus: Completing a region activates its real-time alerts. This is key to attacking high-value targets.
Lotus: You begin at Mercury's Terminus, your only way into the system. It is time for the Tenno to return.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MissionObjecti: Lotus: Your are here to find our target and bring them to the extraction point. Happy hunting.
Lotus: We received intel that someone vital to enemy operations is aboard this ship. Find them, and capture them.
Lotus: You are here on a Capture mission. You must find, capture and extract our target.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/GoalReinforcem: Lotus: The VIP has vital information that we will need to extract, we need our subject brought back alive.
Lotus: We cannot let our target know we're here. Track them down quickly.
Lotus: Our target is aboard this ship somewhere. Find them.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ObjectiveFound: Lotus: You found the VIP. Don't let them escape.
Lotus: There's our target. Capture and extract them.
Lotus: Our subject is here. Capture them and do not let them escape.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ObjectiveCompl: Lotus: Success! The captive is safely in our hands. Congratulations Tenno.
Lotus: Mission complete, the captive has been escorted to the extraction point. Well done.
Lotus: Excellent work. We'll interrogate the captive back at base. Your part is done here, Tenno.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MissionFailedC: Lotus: Mission failed. The target has escaped.
Lotus: They've got away. We have failed.
Lotus: You failed Tenno, your captive has escaped. This doesn't bode well for the campaign.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MissionObjecti: Lotus: This is a rescue mission. We need to find and liberate the hostage before any harm comes to them.
Lotus: Aboard this vessel is a prisoner that is vital to our operations. Search the ship for the holding location.
Lotus: Our intel suggests that our person of interest is aboard this ship. Search all decks for the hostage, and bring them home.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/GoalReinforcem: Lotus: Find the captive as soon as you can, we don't have much time.
Lotus: We can't leave the ship without rescuing the prisoner, keep searching.
Lotus: There's no telling what the captors are doing to our rescue target, you need to find the holding cell immediately.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ObjectiveFound: Lotus: You've located the hostage. Escort the prisoner to the extraction point and I'll take care of the rest.
Lotus: Subject found. You need to move the captive off the ship to safety. Protect them at all costs.
Lotus: Prisoner located. We need to get them back to command in one piece, find your way to the exits and don't leave the subject behind.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ObjectiveCompl: Lotus: Mission complete. The captive has been liberated, you will be rewarded for this Tenno.
Lotus: Escort mission complete, the hostage is safe now. Let's get out of here.
Lotus: The captive has been secured, you've done your part Tenno, we'll take it from here.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MissionObjecti: Lotus: We need to take full control of this ship. Get to the rally point and defend it against enemy attackers.
Lotus: We can't afford to lose this vessel, we must reach the rally point and resist all opposing forces.

Lotus: The artifact we need is on this ship, but it can't be extracted by regular means. We need to take full command of this vessel and defend it against all attackers until an extraction crew can arrive.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/GoalReinforcem: Lotus: You are almost at the rally point, keep moving.
Lotus: We can't let the artifact fall into enemy hands, get to it and defend it at all costs.
Lotus: I'm detecting a high amount of activity at the rally point, you need to get there pronto.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ObjectiveFound: Lotus: Okay, we're here. Take up defensive positions, we're expecting company.
Lotus: This appears to be the primary zone of contention. Brace yourself for attack.
Lotus: Looks like we beat them here, take up a defensive position and be ready for enemy assault teams.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ObjectiveCompl: Lotus: That's the last of them, objective is secure. Lets go home.
Lotus: Very impressive Tenno, you held them all back. Time to get out of here.
Lotus: We're done here. The extraction team will take over from here, time to evacuate.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MissionObjecti: Lotus: This ship is holding the intelligence files we require, find all four computer access terminals and recover the data units from each of them.
Lotus: Intelligence files are stored on four separate data units throughout the ship.  We need all the units before we can begin decryption on the data. Get out there and find them.
Lotus: We need all of the data units being stored on this vessel to compile the intelligence files. Search the ship, find the access terminals, and retrieve each device.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/GoalReinforcem: Lotus: There must be an access terminal around here, keep searching, we need those data units.
Lotus: Its critical that we retrieve that intel. You need to find an access terminal first.
Lotus: We're running out of time, you need to find all the remaining access terminal and get out of there.
Lotus: Keep going, we need all of the data units before you can leave.
Lotus: We don't have all of the logs yet, keep searching for the remaining consoles.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ObjectiveFound: Lotus: Here is one of the access consoles, you need to activate it to recover the data unit.
Lotus: You found an access terminal, use it to release the data mass from its storage unit.
Lotus: Activate the access terminal and it should release the data unit. Get the device, and get to extraction.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ObjectiveCompl: Lotus: Excellent work Tenno, we've got all the data units now. Time to head for the exits.
Lotus: That was the last data unit we needed. Lets get out of here.
Lotus: With all four data units collected we can now compile the intelligence files. We're done here, get to extraction.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/InfestedAccess: Lotus: This looks ominous. Infested or not, we need those data logs. See if you can find any consoles that are still operational.
Lotus: We need all the data logs from any still-functioning consoles aboard this ship. Shouldn't be a problem for you unless the Infested slow you down.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MissionObjecti: Lotus: The Assassination target is aboard this vessel.  Seek and destroy.
Lotus: We need to find the VIP on this ship and take them down. Do not let the target escape.
Lotus: The VIP we are hunting is here, find him, and take him out.
Lotus: Assassination contracts are not to be taken lightly. Eliminating this target will have a significant impact on enemy forces. Search the ship, leave no survivors.
Lotus: We've contracted you with a mark. You are here to find your mark, and eliminate the assigned target.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/GoalReinforcem: Lotus: Keep searching, the VIP is on board somewhere.
Lotus: Be sure to search all sectors on this ship, we need to find and eliminate the target.
Lotus: We can't let the target escape, you need to find them immediately.
Lotus: This mission won't be easy, the target you are to assassinate has survived these attacks before. Be careful.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ObjectiveFound: Lotus: Target spotted. Stay sharp, this one is a handful.
Lotus: There is the assassination target, you know what to do.
Lotus: You've located the VIP, time to go to work.
Lotus: Target acquired, take them down.
Lotus: We've got trouble, the assassination target is here. Wipe them out.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ObjectiveCompl: Lotus: He won't be bothering us anymore, let's get out of here.
Lotus: Nice work taking down the VIP, now get to extraction.
Lotus: Target down, assassination contract complete. Great work Tenno.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MissionA: Lotus: This is a sabotage mission. Reach engineering and destroy the reactor.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MissionB: Lotus: Our target is the ship's reactor. Breach engineering and destroy it. Be careful.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/TargetReactorA: Lotus: Your target is the reactor.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/TargetReactorB: Lotus: We need to destroy the ships reactor.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/TargetReactorC: Lotus: Disabling the reactor core on this ship will cripple its operating capacity. Find it, and take it out.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/GoalReinforcem: Lotus: The reactor will have tight security, so look for large patrols of Grineer.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/TargetFoundB: Lotus: That's the reactor, expose its core and destroy it.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/TargetDestroye: Lotus: Target destroyed, proceed to the extraction point.
Lotus: That's it, now get the hell out of here.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/TargetNavigati: Lotus: Your target is the ship's navigation console. Deliver the payload and override the controls.
Lotus: Okay, you're looking for the ship's navigation system. It's critical that you deliver the payload to that location.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/GoalReinforcem: Lotus: That navigation system is around here somewhere, keep searching for it.
Lotus: You're almost at the target, keep it up.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ObjectiveFound: Lotus: You've found the target. Deliver the payload and get out of there.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/PayloadDeliver: Lotus: Payload delivery successfully, time to go.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/GoalReinforcem: Lotus: Your objective is near, keep pushing forward.
Lotus: Nice work, you're almost at the objective.
Lotus: You're closing in on the target, keep your eyes peeled.
Lotus: You're nearing the target, stay on guard.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/ObjectiveFound: Lotus: There's the artifact, collect what we need and head to extraction.
Lotus: Artifact found, acquire the Orokin technology and head to the rally point.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/InfestedShipA: Lotus: I'm detecting erratic bio signatures all over the place. I think this ship is infested. You know what to do.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/InfestedShipB: Lotus: Infestation has overcome this vessel, let's clear it out.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/InfestedShipC: Lotus: Stay frosty, this ship is infested. See if you can find anything of value on board.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/KillAllObjecti: Lotus: Eliminate all Corpus threats on this space ship.
Lotus: There is a large platoon of Grineer Marines stationed on this vessel. Leave no one standing.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/InfestedExterm: Lotus: We need to clean this vessel up, search for the source of the infestation and exterminate it.
Lotus: We need to clean this vessel up, search for the sources of the infestation and exterminate them.
Lotus: This vessel is crawling with infested. If its not a Tenno, eradicate it.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/GoalReinforcem: Lotus: I'm still detecting a lot of infestation activity, let's clean it up.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/KilledEveryThi: Lotus: No further life forms detected.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/KilledEverythi: Lotus: Other than you, I can't detect a single life form. Let's get out of here.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MobileDefenseO: Lotus: This is a mobile defense mission. You must deliver payloads and defend a number of locations while I break into the Grineer network. Be prepared for heavy resistance. I can't do this without you.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MobileDefenseG: Lotus: This will only get more difficult. Get to another terminal and prepare for enemy resistance.
Lotus: We have got to find another terminal. Proceed and prepare!
Lotus: I need access to another terminal, find one and patch me in!
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MobileDefenseD: Lotus: Location reached: Drop me in and defend our position!
Lotus: Terminal Spotted: Upload me in and prepare to defend!
Lotus: Here is a terminal: Get me in, and get ready to defend!
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MobileDefenseH: Lotus: I'm in, Tenno. This will take a moment.
Lotus: Taking longer than I calculated, continue to defend!
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MobileDefenseD: Lotus: We're finished here, move on!
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MobileDefenseO: Lotus: All Terminals have been successfully hacked. Excellent resistance, Tenno. Let's make our exit!
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MobileDefenseC: Lotus: The odds were against us, Tenno - but we did it. Mission complete.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MobileDefenseB: Lotus: All data logs indicate that there is an Orokin Artifact somewhere here, get to it now, defend it, and then we can leave!
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MobileDefenseN: Lotus: Artifact found. Defend it until the Extraction Team arrives.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/MissionComplet: Lotus: Mission complete. Excellent work Tenno.
Lotus: Great work. I am pleased with your performance.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusSabotageS: Lotus: This generator core on this outpost must be destroyed.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusSabotageM: Lotus: Keep moving. The power source is deep within the outpost.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusSabotageE: Lotus: The power core has been destroyed.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusIntelStar: Lotus: Find all the data units on this outpost! Valuable intel lies within.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusIntelMidd: Lotus: There is still more data.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusIntelEndA: Lotus: All data units located. Let's get out of here.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusExtermina: Lotus: Sensors show this outpost is crawling with infected. Exterminate the threat.
Lotus: I am still picking up signs of the infected, keep hunting.
Lotus: The outpost is clean. Proceed to extraction.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusAssassina: Lotus: Your target is deep within this outpost. Find and eliminate him.
Lotus: Target eliminated. Get out of there.
Lotus: You've found the target, destroy him.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/LotusDefenseGa: Lotus: Our position has been compromised. Defend the cargo until reinforcements arrive.
Lotus: The enemy are at our doorstep. You must defend our equipment until reinforcements arrive.
Lotus: Their reinforcements are endless! Are you ready for more?
Lotus: Incoming targets. You know what to do.
Lotus: Reinforcements are inbound. Hold the line.
Lotus: We are readying reinforcements. Keep fighting Tenno.
Lotus: Reinforcements available, do you choose to leave now or continue fighting?
Lotus: Extraction is ready. Unless you can handle more of the enemy.
Lotus: Rest now, others will continue the battle.
Lotus: Go now Tenno. You have done well.
Lotus: Continue to defend! You will be rewarded for your bravery.
Lotus: Keep fighting. Another opportunity attraction will appear soon.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/SabotageMining: Lotus: The Grineer have been harvesting a nearby planetoid for weapons-grade material. Locate and destroy their mining equipment.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DFmrn00010Lotu: Lotus: Destroying a single reactor will not be enough to take down a Fomorian. We will need to poison the well... coordinated teams will corrupt it's fuel supply. This will require gear harvested from Infestation tissues. I will route you to an injector point...
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DFmrn00020Lotu: Lotus: These Fomorians are massive, keep searching. You will need to locate a fuel cell and inject the corrupting agent. I hope you have a corruptor with you.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DFmrn00030Lotu: Lotus: Remember, if you are coordinating with other Tenno the Alpha/Beta mixtures are more potent, but a single Tenno cannot equip them at once.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DFmrn00040Lotu: Lotus: There it is! You should be able to inject the corruptor you brought using the attached console.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DFmrn00050Lotu: Lotus: Excellent, the corruption process has begun. You must defend this position to ensure the Grineer do not destroy this fuel cell before it spreads through the ship.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DFmrn00060Lotu: Lotus: Corruption process is complete. Good work Tenno. Get to extraction where I will record your contribution to the operation!
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/SabotageMining: Lotus: The mining equipment is nearby. It must be destroyed to prevent the Grineer from developing energy weapons.
Lotus: This research could have unimaginable repercussions. Be on your guard.
Lotus: Mission success hinges on the destruction of the mining equipment. Expect heavy resistance.
Lotus: Excellent work. You have managed to thwart potentially dangerous discoveries from being fully realized… for now.
Lotus: The Grineer are preparing to magnetically mine asteroids for rare alloys to be used in body augmentations and modifications. Paralyze their research by destroying the mining equipment.
Lotus: A heavily armed security force stands between you and the mining equipment. Stay alert.
Lotus: Crippling their equipment will effectively cripple their research.
Lotus: We need you back alive. Stay alert.
Lotus: You are gaining the upper hand. Push forward.
Lotus: They are aware of your presence. Make haste.
Lotus: Well done. You have brought the Grineer research to a sudden halt.

Lotus: A dormant comet is being targeted by the Grineer for its volatile materials. The material will be used in the manufacturing of fuel propellant for their fleet. Locate and cripple their equipment.
Lotus: Destroy the mining equipment before the Grineer can intercept the comet.
Lotus: It is time to bring the Grineer fleet to a standstill. Strike them where it hurts.
Lotus: Halting fuel production will give us a much needed advantage. Determine the position of the equipment.
Lotus: Hostiles inbound. Strike hard and fast.
Lotus: Impressive. This will temporarily immobilize the Grineer fleet. We will move-in and claim the comet.
Lotus: The Grineer have set their sights on a large asteroid thought to contain an abundance of Rubedo. Locate and destroy the extraction equipment.
Lotus: Rubedo must be protected at any cost. Sabotage the nearby mining equipment.
Lotus: It is imperative we do not let the Grineer get their hands on the Rubedo.
Lotus: You are approaching a piece of equipment. Watch your back.
Lotus: Good work. Your efforts have prevented Grineer access to the Rubedo. We have an extraction team en route to appropriate the planetoid's contents.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DualMissionObj: Lotus: We've received a message that we are to eliminate this ship's captain. Assassinate the target aboard this ship.
Lotus: Well, this just got interesting. We now need to capture the target aboard this ship.
Lotus: It seems we'll be here a little longer. Deposit a data unit into the ship's navigation.
Lotus: We've received a second objective. Defend the artifact on this ship before it's destroyed.
Lotus: Change of plans, ignore your original objective. Leave nothing alive on this ship. Exterminate all life.
Lotus: It appears there's some valuable intel stored about this ship. Gather the intel now.
Lotus: I can't breach this door's security. We'll have to find a key pass. Scanning the ship now... Key signal detected. Marking on your HUD.
Lotus: We're locked out, patching us in now. I can't bypass this door. Scanning ship now for key pass... and, found it. Marking location on your HUD.
Lotus: Our mission just got more complicated. There's a hostage on this ship. Rescue them now.
Lotus: Well, what do you know. I'm detecting an Orokin Artifact aboard this vessel. Extract it before we leave.
Lotus: It appears we now need to take this ship out from the inside. This ship cannot be left operational. Destroy its Reactor Core.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DExtermObj0001: Lotus: I'm detecting erratic bio signatures all over the place. I think this ship is infested. You know what to do.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DExtermObj0002: Lotus: Infestation has overcome this vessel, let's clear it out.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DExtermObj0003: Lotus: Stay frosty, this ship is infested. See if you can find anything of value on board.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DExtermGoalRei: Lotus: We need to clean this vessel up, search for the source of the infestation and exterminate it.
Lotus: We need to clean this vessel up, search for the sources of the infestation and exterminate them.
Lotus: This vessel is crawling with infested. If its not a Tenno, eradicate it.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DExtermObjComp: Lotus: Corpus extermination complete, get to extraction.
Lotus: No further life forms detected.
Lotus: Other than you, I can't detect a single life form. Let's get out of here.
/Lotus/Language/Subtitles/DRaidObj00010L: Lotus: The artifact we're looking for is aboard this ship somewhere, see what you can find.

/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_HelpShapeFutu: AIUTA A PLASMARE IL FUTURO DI WARFRAME
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_WarframesDesc: L'eso-armatura Warframe usa una tecnologia da combattimento unica per creare l'armamentario definitivo. I Warframe nascondono molti poteri misteriosi e apprenderne uno richiede molta pratica.
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_TrinityDesc: Trinity è ottimo per giocatori che preferiscono un ruolo di supporto. I Warframe con tecnologia curativa sono rari e rendono Trinity un ottimo equalizzatore quando le probabilità sono a sfavore dei Tenno.
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_VoltDesc: Volt può creare e sfruttare elementi elettrici. E' un Warframe ad alto danno perfetto per giocatori che vogliono una potente alternativa alle armi da fuoco.
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_AshDesc: Ash è adatto ai giocatori alla ricerca di un approccio più furtivo al combattimento. Abilità letali sono abbinate a poteri di distrazione.
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_NyxDesc: Controllo mentale e attacchi psichici rendono Nyx un nemico davvero pericoloso. La sua abilità nell' entrare nella coscienza del nemico e manipolare il suo comportamento può invertire il risultato di ogni battaglia.
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_EmberDesc: Ember è un incubo per gli avversari dotati di armatura leggera. Ember può surriscaldare l'aria, agevolando le sue capacità nel manipolare i nemici.
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_FrostDesc: Incanalando umidità e vapore nell'ambiente circostante, FROST crea difese formidabili e attacchi letali da condizioni sotto lo zero.
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_ExcaliburDesc: Il perfetto Warframe da allenamento: Excalibur permette ai giocatori di esplorare il potere dei Warframe con una combinazione equilibrata di abilità.
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_MagDesc: Avendo controllo completo sull'energia magnetica circostante, Mag è un esperto nel manipolare il nemico. E' la scelta perfetta per i giocatori che vogliono infliggere danni consistenti in modi non convenzionali.
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_RhinoDesc: Rhino è il più pesante tra tutti i Warframe. La sua forza gli consente di combinare attacchi offensivi devastanti con formidabili poteri difensivi.
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_LokiDesc: Desiderato da giocatori esperti, Loki offre una varietà di abilità specializzate riconfigurabili. L'anormalità dei poteri di Loki permette ai giocatori di dominare il campo di battaglia.
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_FoundersPackD: Diventare fondatore ha i suoi vantaggi. Ottieni oggetti esclusivi che non saranno più disponibili, PIU' accesso immediato alla Closed Beta!
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_FoundersPackA: TUTTI I KIT FONDATORI INCLUDONO ACCESSO IMMEDIATO ALLA CLOSED BETA
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_IncreaseSuppo: AUMENTA IL TUO SUPPORTO PER WARFRAME
/Lotus/Language/Webpage/WP_UpgradeDesc: Aggiorna il tuo kit fondatore e paga solo la differenza dal tuo acquisto iniziale.
